ISSUE.TITLE: Disable environment variables for plugins in yaml
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Proposal to return a lint error when the user attempts to declare environment variables for plugin steps in the yaml. For example, the following would fail with lint errors: ``` pipeline: slack: image: plugins/slack environment: - DEBUG=true ``` Instead the plugin author should create input parameters that in turn set the appropriate environment variables when the plugin initializes. ```diff pipeline: slack: image: plugins/slack + debug: true - environment: - - DEBUG=true ```
